txt.en: You have sealed many leaks within Járnfast.
When the earth shook following Sauron's defeat, great tremors came to the Emyn Engrin and now the River Carnen spills into the halls of Járnfast.
You have sealed many leaks and prevented the River Carnen from flooding Járnfast. As a result, the Dwarves of the Ironfold will be able to work unhindered to repair the halls of Járnfast.
Leaks can be found throughout Járnfast.\n\nHolkur has asked you to aid the Dwarves of the Iron Hills in sealing leaks from the underground source of the River Carnen in Járnfast.

'Do you hear that, [placeholder]?

'It is the sound of the River Carnen... spouting into our halls! Ever since those tremors shook Járnfast, we have had leaks. They have appeared all about, and the water is red with rust. I have worked to seal them, but it is too great a task for one dwarf, I think!

'Will you aid me?'
